summary: The perfect rogue for the stealthy type or looking for a stealthy companion
descriptionHtml:
Mysti Blades is a mysterious rogue thats looking for work, and looking to cause some carnage along the way.

Not much is known about this one, Rumor has it that her eyes are black as night and no one has seen her face and lived to tell the tale.

You can find her down at the Ragged Flaggon in Riften where you will find her amongst the wretched hive of scum and villainy of Riften! (Points to those who know that line from)

 = Compatible Mods = 
See: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11770/?]Let's Get Naked[/url]﻿
See: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10748/?]Animated Prostiution[/url]﻿
See: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My home is Your Home[/url]﻿
See: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Body Edition[/url]

= Recommended Mods = (OPTIONAL)

Don't like what shes wearing? Then get these mods

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8530/?]Tradeable Companion Gear[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13571/?]Duel Weilding for Followers[/url]﻿ (Recommended as she makes quite the duelist)


Update 1.2
Mysti updated to CSthalmorduel settings, When in combat she now will duel weild 

Update 1.1
Mysti was having a dagger issues, so a dagger change was made, she questioned it first and had a couple of goes at me for doing it, but she has seen reason for now....Anyone got a healing spell handy?
author: Romire
